rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment factually reports the predominant strain using neutral language.
The segment reports a factual characteristic of the virus strain.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports a fact about the strain but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment states the predominant strain, not capability or preparedness.
